sources.title: Hidden Gold
sources.description: Title: Hidden Gold Summary: Hoppy and Lucky confront a gang of outlaws which has been ravaging stagecoaches and gold mines. The final gunfight is at Ed Colby's mine. Directed by: Lesley Selander Actors: William Boyd, Russell Hayden, Minor Watson Production Company: Harry Sherman Productions Release Date: 7 June 1940 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 Hoppy and Lucky have been called in to investigate a series of stage holdups. The robbers are taking gold from Colby's mine and Hoppy suspects it may be ex-outlaw Colby himself. When Speedy strikes gold, Hoppy borrows it and announces a gold shipment hoping to catch the gang and their leader.

metadata.Plot: Hoppy and Lucky have been called in to investigate a series of stage holdups. The robbers are taking gold from Colby's mine and Hoppy suspects it may be ex-outlaw Colby himself. When Speedy strikes gold, Hoppy borrows it and announces a gold shipment hoping to catch the gang and their leader.
metadata.Writer: Gerald Geraghty, Jack Merserveau, Clarence E. Mulford
metadata.Actors: William Boyd, Russell Hayden, Minor Watson
